bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with feng fei 風痱 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry gou 狗 quoting MYBL mu gou yin jing 牡狗陰莖：齒…主癲癇寒熱，卒風痱 , “The teeth …control peak-illness with epilepsy, alternating sensations of cold and heat, and sudden wind disablement”, writes: 癲癇寒熱，卒風疿 , “Peak-illness with alternating sensations of cold and heat, and sudden wind[-caused] disablement ”. 疿 may simply be an erroneous writing of 痱 .
